--- 
title: R Files for Data Science Lessons
---

Here, you can find R code files for each lesson we have on this website. Each link below will download a .zip file containing the code and datasets for each lesson. We recommend you open the files using [Rstudio desktop](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) or [posit.cloud](https://posit.cloud/content/yours?sort=name_asc) (an online version of Rstudio).
